text: Teuma di Isa aneuk Mariyam Geukheun bak kawom lon rasul Allah Hai cot Israil lon rasul Tuhan Bak gata bandum lon ba risalah Kitab nyang ka na jinoe beuna that Nyan kitab Taurat tron nibak Allah r Teuma lom saboh haba gembira Akan troh teuka rasul meutuah I Rasul ‘oh Iheuh lon nan gopnyan Ahmad Geuba amanat Neuyue le Allah ‘Oh ban troh geuba amanat Tuhan d Ubak awak nyan jikheun treuk salah Atra nyoe sihe leupah that nyata
